body_html: @junshi15, one thing that I observed to happen repeatedly was that after the RDMA channels have been built, worker 1 sent a RDMA_MESSAGE_TENSOR_REQUEST to PS, and never got an ACK. Then worker 1 was blocked there. And, PS never received that RDMA_MESSAGE_TENSOR_REQUEST . Does this ring a bell?
body_text: @junshi15, one thing that I observed to happen repeatedly was that after the RDMA channels have been built, worker 1 sent a RDMA_MESSAGE_TENSOR_REQUEST  to PS, and never got an ACK. Then worker 1 was blocked there. And, PS never received that RDMA_MESSAGE_TENSOR_REQUEST . Does this ring a bell?
body: @junshi15, one thing that I observed to happen repeatedly was that after the RDMA channels have been built, worker 1 sent a `RDMA_MESSAGE_TENSOR_REQUEST ` to PS, and never got an ACK. Then worker 1 was blocked there. And, PS never received that `RDMA_MESSAGE_TENSOR_REQUEST `. Does this ring a bell?
